displayName.text: New York Center for Spinal Disorders - Dr. Nathaniel L. Tindel, M.D.

formattedAddress: 425 E 79th St #1h, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 425 E 79th St #1h, New York, NY 10075-1038, USA

originalText.text: On Nov 15 2022 I fell about 15 feet off a rock wall, fracturing my lumbar spine. I was brought to the Jacobi Hospital Trauma Center and was terrified. 3 days later on 11/18 Dr. Tindel performed a spinal fusion on me. I was in the hospital for 3 weeks recovering from the injury and continued to see Dr. Tindel for bimonthly checkups after I left the hospital. Today on 9/26/23 I was formally discharged from his care. I am walking normally and have no significant back pain. Dr. Tindel is a skillful, empathetic, and kind doctor. I always felt completely comfortable with him even when I was afraid. I feel extremely fortunate that he was working in Jacobi at the time of my accident. I recommend him ðŸ’¯ percent.

originalText.text: I came with a severe back pain due to a herniated disk and beginning of dropfoot and sensory loss in my left leg. Dr. Tindel was very patient, knowledgeable, with great bedside manners. He didnâ€™t push for surgery, went over all the options, explained all the details and answered patiently to the numerous questions. I am very satisfied that I trusted my back to Dr. Tindel hands. I had a surgery and woke up without that terrible nerve pain. I highly recommend Dr. Tindel as a spine specialist and surgeon. His staff was very welcoming, and Annie was great with all the paperwork for the hospital and very accommodating.

originalText.text:
Dr. Tindel takes his time with his patients and explains your conditions in a language that is easy to understand. He is kind and considerate and I feel privleged to have been operated on by him. His staff is just as great. I read his book "I've Got Your Back" and have passed it on to several people.
I highly recommend him!

originalText.text:
Dr. Tindel is amazing! He is so patient and makes sure to explain everything and answer all of your questions. He is kind, considerate and just brilliant. I'm reading his book "I've Got Your Back" and it's unbelievable. Thank you, Doctor, for your support and help!

Also, the staff is great and friendly. Thank you!

originalText.text: Dr. Tindel is a life saver. He literally saved my life after I broke my back at work. Best spinal surgeon you can possibly find. Donâ€™t waste your time with another doctor, just go right to him. Best office staff Iâ€™ve ever dealt with as well. Thank you Dr. Tindel for bringing my life back to me. You and your staff are a God-send.
